backend/main.mo: Motoko backend with access control that stores user profiles and manages contact requests with admin‑restricted queries.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence listing implemented frontend files, components, and test mappings for several app features.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining OKLCH color variables, dark mode values, and global element styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading fonts and mounting the root React app with metadata for the site.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app with hash‑based routing, header/footer, admin page access, and profile setup prompt.
frontend/src/components/auth/AdminRouteG: Guard component that checks authentication and admin role, showing appropriate fallback screens.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Button handling Internet Identity login/logout with loading and error recovery logic.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal prompting new users to save their profile name before continuing.
frontend/src/components/forms/RequestErr: A form component that collects errand request details, validates input, composes a message, and submits it via a custom hook with success handling.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteFoote: Footer displaying branding, quick navigation links, contact info, and a credits bar with dynamic year and referral link.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteHeade: Header with logo, navigation buttons, mobile menu, and identity-aware admin/login controls, including smooth scrolling behavior.
frontend/src/components/sections/Contact: Section containing contact information and the request form, structured with a two-column layout on large screens.
frontend/src/components/sections/HeroSec: Landing hero section with headline, description, call-to-action buttons, and a hero image.
frontend/src/components/sections/HowItWo: Section showing three steps of the service process with icons, titles, and descriptions.
frontend/src/components/sections/Service: Services listing with cards for each offering and a button to scroll to the contact form, optionally preselecting a service.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages a backend actor based on identity, initializing access control and invalidating dependent queries when changed.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminRequests.ts: React Query hooks for fetching and mutating admin contact requests and user profile/role data via the actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, handles identity loading, login, logout, and status management.
frontend/src/hooks/useSubmitContactReque: Mutation hook to submit a new contact request through the actor and invalidate related queries.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles with custom color variables, typography, dark mode, and utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point that initializes React Query and wraps the app with the Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/pages/AdminRequestsPage.tsx: Admin UI for listing, sorting, and viewing details of contact requests with loading and error states.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Landing page assembling hero, overview, services, workflow, and contact sections.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters, including hash-based routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending fonts, colors, layout, and animations with custom variables and plugins.
project_state.json: Tracks project state, required images, and a list of existing features for a delivery-service introduction app. Includes metadata such as schema version, project version, and architectural notes.
